Package ml.alternet.security.auth.formats

Common built-in crypt formats used to retrieve concrete hashers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DiscoverableCryptFormat
    Allow to lookup a hasher builder with the discovery service.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColonCryptFormat
    With the Colon Crypt format, the parts are separated by ":".
    CryptFormatBase
    A crypt format based on enum values.
    CurlyBracesCryptFormat
    The scheme of this format appears in curly braces.
    ModularCryptFormat
    The Modular Crypt Format is an ad-hoc standard used in popular linux-based systems.
    PlainTextCryptFormat
    A fallback format for passwords stored in plain text ; DO NOT USE IN PRODUCTION.
    SchemeWithEncoding
    A scheme with encoding, e.g.
    UnixCryptFormat
    Legacy Unix Crypt Formats : A DES-crypt hash string consists of 13 characters, drawn from [./0-9A-Za-z] :
    password -> JQMuyS6H.AGMo A fallback to MD5 32 hexa character hash :
    11fbe079ed3476f7712030d24042ca35
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CurlyBracesCryptFormat.Hashers
    LDAP hash formats specified by RFC 2307 including standard formats {MD5}, {SMD5}, {SHA}, {SSHA} and extensions.
    ModularCryptFormat.Hashers
    Out-of-the box modular crypt format hashers.
    UnixCryptFormat.Hashers
    Unix algorithms.

Package ml.alternet.security.auth.formats Description

Common built-in crypt formats used to retrieve concrete hashers.
